home.title: Web Tools Collection
home.description: Access useful web tools in one place
home.keywords: web tools, online tools, password generator, PDF converter, file converter

passwordGenerator.title: 🔐 Password Generator
passwordGenerator.description: Generate secure and strong passwords. You can set length and character types, and check the security strength of generated passwords in real time.

pdfConverter.title: 📄 PDF Converter
pdfConverter.description: Convert PDF files to high-quality PNG images. Processed directly in your browser for security, with various quality options available.

fileConverter.title: 📁 File Converter Guide
fileConverter.description: Collection of free tools and safe conversion methods for various file format conversions like HWP to Word, Excel to PDF, and more.

home.securityDescription: All tools are processed on the client side, so personal information is not transmitted to servers.

fileConverter.title: File Conversion Tools Guide - Free Online Converters
fileConverter.description: Complete guide to free online file conversion tools: HWP to Word, Excel to PDF, and more. Safe conversion methods and security tips.
fileConverter.keywords: file converter, HWP to Word, free conversion tools, online file converter, document conversion
fileConverter.bannerSubtitle: Convert various file formats safely and for free
securityItems: Privacy First: Avoid uploading files with sensitive information
Auto-Delete: Ensure uploaded files are automatically deleted after conversion
HTTPS Only: Use only secure sites with SSL encryption (🔒)
Scan Downloads: Run antivirus scans on converted files

hwpWord.title: 📝 HWP ↔ Word Conversion
hwpWord.description: Convert Korean HWP documents to Microsoft Word format and vice versa
steps: Visit conversion site and upload your file
Click convert and wait for completion

archive.title: 📦 Archive Conversion
archive.description: Convert between ZIP, RAR, 7Z and other compression formats

toolFeatures: ILovePDF: Free, fast processing, batch conversion support
SmallPDF: Intuitive UI, cloud integration, free limitations apply
Convertio: 200+ format support, API available, 100MB free limit
Zamzar: 1200+ formats, email notifications, 50MB free limit
offlineTools: LibreOffice: Free open-source, HWP/Office file support
HWP Viewer: Official HWP viewer, free to use
WPS Office: Free, good international support
